custom_css: .featured-products__list {display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; justify-content: center; align-items: stretch;}
.featured-products__item {background: white; padding: 15px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;}
.featured-products__link {text-decoration: none; color: inherit; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;}
.featured-products__add-to-cart {margin-top: 10px; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: #333; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;}
